Memorial Pool, Berkeley

Memorial Pool, Berkeley on Flickr.

Memorial Pool is a small, and somewhat secluded reflection pool which sits along the edge of memorial glade with views of both the campanile and a little bit of Doe Library. Itâ€™s surrounded by trees which makes it nice and quiet and an excellent study spot when the weather is warm!
